item.text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“<st data-num="05375" class="">Take</st> a <st data-num="07218" class="">census</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="01121 06955">Kohathites</st> from <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="01121 03881">Levites</st>, by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> and by their <st data-num="01004 01">clans</st>,

from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="01121 06955">Kohathites</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>, relating to the <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st>.<n id="1" />

When it is time for the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> to <st data-num="05265" class="">journey</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> must <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="03381" class="">take down</st> the <st data-num="04539" class="">screening</st> <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st> and <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> with it.
Then they must put over it a covering of fine leather and spread over that a cloth entirely of blue, and then they must insert its poles.
“On the table of the presence they must spread a blue cloth, and put on it the dishes, the pans, the bowls, and the pitchers for pouring, and the Bread of the Presence must be on it continually.
They must spread over them a scarlet cloth, and cover the same with a covering of fine leather; and they must insert its poles.
“They must take a blue cloth and cover the lampstand of the light, with its lamps, its wick-trimmers, its trays, and all its oil vessels, with which they service it.
Then they must put it with all its utensils in a covering of fine leather, and put it on a carrying beam.
“They must spread a blue cloth on the gold altar, and cover it with a covering of fine leather; and they must insert its poles.

Then they must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st> of the <st data-num="08335" class="">service</st>, with <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> they <st data-num="08334" class="">serve</st> in the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">cloth</st>, <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> them with a <st data-num="04372" class="">covering</st> of <st data-num="08476" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>, and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="04132" class="">carrying beam</st>.

Also, they must <st data-num="01878" class="">take away the ashes from</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06566" class="">spread</st> a <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">cloth</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> it.

Then they must place on it all its implements with which they serve there—the trays, the meat forks, the shovels, the basins, and all the utensils of the altar—and they must spread on it a covering of fine leather, and then insert its poles.

“When Aaron and his sons have finished covering the sanctuary and all the furnishings of the sanctuary, when the camp is ready to journey, then the Kohathites will come to carry them; but they must not touch any holy thing, or they will die. These are the responsibilities of the Kohathites with the tent of meeting.

“The appointed responsibility of Eleazar son of Aaron the priest is for the oil for the light, and the spiced incense, and the daily grain offering, and the anointing oil; he also has the appointed responsibility over all the tabernacle with all that is in it, over the sanctuary and over all its furnishings.”
Then the Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> allow the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> of the <st data-num="06956" class="">Kohathites</st> to be <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st>;

but in order that they will <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> when they <st data-num="05066" class="">approach</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st>, <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> for them: <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> in and <st data-num="07760" class="">appoint</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> and his <st data-num="04853" class="">responsibility</st>.
But the Kohathites are not to go in to watch while the holy things are being covered, or they will die.”
Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="01571" class="">Also</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="07218" class="">census</st> of the <st data-num="01121 01648">Gershonites</st> also, by their <st data-num="01004 01">clans</st> and by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st>.

You must <st data-num="06485" class="">number</st> them from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="0935 06633">enter</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st> to <st data-num="05647" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> of <st data-num="01649" class="">Gershonites</st>, as they <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="04853" class="">carry</st> it.

They must <st data-num="05375" class="">carry</st> the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> for the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> and the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st> with its <st data-num="04372" class="">covering</st>, the <st data-num="04372" class="">covering</st> of <st data-num="08476" class="">fine leather</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="05921 04605">over</st> it, the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtains</st> for the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>,

the hangings for the courtyard, the curtain for the entrance of the gate of the court, which is around the tabernacle and the altar, and their ropes, along with all the furnishings for their service and everything that is made for them. So they are to serve.
“All the service of the Gershonites, whether carrying loads or for any of their work, will be at the direction of Aaron and his sons. You will assign them all their tasks as their responsibility.
This is the service of the families of the Gershonites concerning the tent of meeting. Their responsibilities will be under the authority of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest.
“As for the sons of Merari, you are to number them by their families and by their clans.

You must <st data-num="06485" class="">number</st> them from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st> to <st data-num="05647" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is <st data-num="04931" class="">what</st> they <st data-num="04931" class="">are responsible</st> to <st data-num="04853" class="">carry</st> as their <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>: the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, its <st data-num="01280" class="">crossbars</st>, its <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st>, its <st data-num="0134" class="">sockets</st>,

and the <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> of the <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> with their <st data-num="0134" class="">sockets</st>, <st data-num="03489" class="">tent pegs</st>, and <st data-num="04340" class="">ropes</st>, along with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> for their <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st>. You are to <st data-num="06485" class="">assign</st> by <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">items</st> that each man is <st data-num="04931" class="">responsible</st> to <st data-num="04853" class="">carry</st>.<n id="1" />
This is the service of the families of the Merarites, their entire service concerning the tent of meeting, under the authority of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest.”
So Moses and Aaron and the leaders of the community numbered the Kohathites by their families and by clans,

from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>;

and those of them <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="0505 07651 03967 02572">2,750</st>.
These were those numbered from the families of the Kohathites, everyone who served in the tent of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the Lord by the authority of Moses.
Those numbered from the Gershonites, by their families and by their clans,

from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>—

those of them <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st>, by their <st data-num="01004 01">clans</st>, <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="0505 08337 03967 07970">2,630</st>.
These were those numbered from the families of the Gershonites, everyone who served in the tent of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the Lord.
Those numbered from the families of the Merarites, by their families, by their clans,

from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">company</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>—
those of them <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="07969 0505 03967">3,200</st>.
These are those numbered from the families of the Merarites, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the Lord by the authority of Moses.
All who were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses, Aaron, and the leaders of Israel numbered by their families and by their clans,

from <st data-num="07970" class="">thirty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fifty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> to <st data-num="05647" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> of <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> and the <st data-num="05656" class="">work</st> of <st data-num="04853" class="">carrying</st><n id="1" /> relating to the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>—
those of them <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="08083 0505 02568 03967 08084">8,580</st>.

According to the word of the Lord they were numbered, by the authority of Moses, each according to his service and according to what he was to carry. Thus were they numbered by him, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
